context: Security incident involving a compromised user account with the account SID `S-0-6-5` delivering ransomware files. The alert was triggered due to the suspicious WMI process creation observed on the machine, which is possibly used by malware to spawn new processes.
question: There is also a suspicious WMI process creation related to this incident. Can you provide the command line details of the process observed?
solution_steps: A user account was seen delivering ransomware-related files on host `vnevado-win11t`.
A suspicious WMI process was created with process ID `6280` at `2024-06-20t09:29:43.9198085z` using the command line `powershell -file c:\scripts\get-userprttoken.ps1`.
